channel.title: Can you do this (718 webclient)?
channel.description: I have a decent VPS I'm hosting my 718 server, that loads a 728 cache on. All is good but I want to add highscores. I'm hosting my website with 000webhost, and I know you can't use remote sql with free hosting so could I somehow host the highscores database on my VPS with xaamp or something? How would I go about doing this?

item.title: Can you do this (718 webclient)?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You can. Just create a table (ie using phpmyadmin or something) and configure its connection details properly. You can probably find hundreds of tutorials on this.

Read full topic
